favourite.article: Lord Jesus, YOU are the OVERCOMING ONE within us, yes! Hallelujah!
I will be an overcomer, I will make this choice. Christ is calling now. I will then be such a follower.

Thank You Dear Lord, You are the overcoming One within us. We want to cooperate with You, with Your heart's desire. We have to search for You as our first love, and never leave You. We dare to suffer persecution, and, we like to be faithful to the end. Hallelujah!!!!!!!
It is only by Your grace that I can overcome! Lord, give me more of Your grace that I may overcome!

Thank You Lord for making us to be those who can overcome. You are the overcoming One within us. May You cause us to cooperate with You in prayers and meetings amen. We can all overcome for You are within us as life. So bouyant is this life and it is never weak. Oh Lord Jesus we love You and we love the saints. We love Thy church oh Lord now come and build us in love and life. Amen. Keep us in our spirit Lord, minding just the spirit, Amen.
With everything in me I pray that I will be an overcomer! Lord Jesus please lead me to my crown. I will listen to Your voice!
Amen! Praise the Lord! I make this choice. I want to be an overcomer in my whole life. O Lord Jesus, Amen!

Out of the church the Lord must get His overcomers. Will you be an overcomer? An overcomer exercises to be in his/her spirit all the time, today more than yesterday and to be in the meetings of the church. O Lord Jesus, gain Your overcomers from among us. Lord Jesus, we don't know how but we can exercise to be in our spirit today more than yesterday, to be in the meetings of the church. Amen, O Lord Jesus!
Yes Lord! we want to be overcomer to respond to Your calling, to listen to Your voice, to follow You Lord.
I love this hymn because I really want to be an overcomer. I want to be the firstfruit for the Lord's satisfaction! Amen! I'm making this choice now! BE AN OVERCOMER!

yes!!! I want to become an overcomer, as first fruit and a living overcomer!!! serving and loving the Lord!!! faithful till the end!!! never let the first love and the best love fade..!!! PRAISE THE LORD!!!

Me too!
This song's chorus has different meanings in different languages. In Chinese and Japanese the chorus is: "Will You be an overcomer, satisfy Lord's want? Lord is calling, Lord is calling, for You to get the crown."
In Spanish it is: "Are You among the overcomers, follow in pursuit? Christ's calling, Christ's calling, listen to His voice!"
I want to be an overcomer because... 1. I want to make a smart choice. 2. I want to get the crown. 3. I love to follow Him. 4. I love to listen to His voice. 5. Most importantly, because I love Him and wants to satisfy His wants by accomplishing His economy.
Yes! I will be an overcomer! OH LORD JESUS!
Yes! I will be an overcomer! I will make this choice! Amen!
